name: BurstSquash
description:
Inspired by Accel World written by Reki Kawahara.

Do you wish to accelerate even further?

By installing this game, your Virtual Reality is never going to be the same.

BurstSquash is more than an Arcade Squash Game.

Bend the rules by using Accel Commands to accelerate your mind and body.

Use four kinds Accel Commands to beat the High score.

Of course if you're an expert Squash player, you can beat the game without using Accel Commands.

BurstSquash was developed in 48 hours during a local charity Game Jame: 1Up Jam using Unreal Engine 4 with full Blueprint. The game has force feedback and Stereophonic sound which create an amazing immersive gaming experience.

Part of the game's income will be donated to Cancer Research.

Stretch Goals:

  • 30+ downloads: Launch on Steam Greenlight.
  • 300+ downloads: New Update contains more Levels, different Game Modes, optional Color & Sounds, Lightsaber Racket, Customizable Accel Commands and probably Voice Reorganization.
  • 3000+ downloads: Let's make a Sequel!
  • 30000+ downloads: Fully Open Source. :D

System Requirements:

VR ready Computer

HTC Vive Only
